bookTitle: A Search for God, Book I
bookAuthors: Edgar Cayce, Members of Study Group #1 of the Association for Research & Enlightenment, Association for Research & Enlightenment
Plot: In 1931, Edgar Cayce agreed to help a group of people grow spiritually and become more psychic, with one condition: They would have to live the precepts. It took the group eleven years to apply and compile the twenty-four lessons that became A Search for God, Books I and II. This material has helped individuals and groups around the world to discover a closer attunement to God.
